AbilityBonusOption.Description: Unit produces 1 mana per turn and gains +5 Spell Mastery

The Chaos Legion is able to possess normal minds with Demon souls. The process requires a huge ritual where most Demons will simply lose their lives instead of being useful. Who is actually possessed is also very hit and miss which is why this ability is used mostly to capture fortressess or other strategical locations.
The faction has access to the spell Possess Minds. The spell instantly flips a city to Chaos Legion control and costs 200 Demon Souls (see Limited Numbers).
